page.title: 10HALMEREND YOUTH CLUB
page.content: Halmerend Youth Club is situated in High Street,Halmerend about 100 yards from the school. The Youth Club building itself is like a small house which has 2 large rooms and 1 small one with a counter in it.It is run by Mrs.Hackwood voluntarily but there is also a youth club leader to help. The senior youth club is on Tuesday and Friday night between 8.00 & 10.00pm. The average age of the seniors is between 15-16.The juniors youth club is on Thursday between 6.00 & 8.00.The age of the juniors is 14 and under. There are activities in the club such as pool and table tennis but many of us use the club as a way of making new friends.We have to give a small amount each visit (20p) to go towards electric used during youth club hours. Sara Harrison.
